text: The Curitiba Challenger is a professional tennis tournament played on clay courts. It is currently part of the Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP) Challenger Tour. It is held annually in Curitiba, Brazil, since 2016. ==Past finals== ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2016 || Agustín Velotti || André Ghem || 6–0, 6–4 |} ===Doubles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champions !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2016 || Rubén Ramírez Hidalgo Pere Riba || André Ghem Fabrício Neis || 6–73–7, 6–4, [10–7] |} == External links == *Official website *ITF Search Category:ATP Challenger Tour Category:Clay court tennis tournaments Category:Tennis tournaments in Brazil
title: Curitiba Challenger
